job description:
Business Data Analyst

The successful Business Data Analyst will serve as a data expert across the entire company offering thoughtful analysis and meaningful insight to internal stakeholders enabling informed business decisions. This person will ensure data quality by applying proven statistical and analytical methods. They'll collaborate regularly with company leaders to understand business insights and intelligence that they require to manage and grow the company. Will need to be driven to continuously develop skills and knowledge to stay current with changes in technology.

All you need is:
  • BS or MS in a relevant field.
  • 5+ years of intensive hands on experience with data analysis and/or problem solving.
  • Working knowledge of SQL and running SQL queries.
Apply to join an award-winning team that offers competitive compensation, commissions, excellent benefits and flexibility!

Our company provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics.
